Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.name: organizationId
Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.abstract: Your organization identifier from the TrustPin dashboard.

Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.name: projectId
Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.abstract: Your project identifier from the TrustPin dashboard.

Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.name: publicKey
Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.abstract: Base64-encoded public key used to verify the signature of the pinning payload.

Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.name: mode
Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.abstract: Controls how TrustPin behaves for domains not present in the pinning payload.

Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.name: configurationURL
Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.abstract: Custom URL for the signed pinning payload.

Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.name: init(organizationId:projectId:publicKey:mode:configurationURL:)
Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html#/s:11.abstract: Creates a new TrustPinConfiguration with the required credentials and optional overrides.

Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html.name: TrustPinConfiguration
Structs/TrustPinConfiguration.html.abstract: Encapsulates all configuration options for a TrustPin instance.

Enums/TrustPinMode.html#/s:11TrustPinKit.name: strict
Enums/TrustPinMode.html#/s:11TrustPinKit.abstract: Strict mode: Enforces certificate pinning validation for all domains.

Enums/TrustPinMode.html#/s:11TrustPinKit.name: permissive
Enums/TrustPinMode.html#/s:11TrustPinKit.abstract: Permissive mode: Allows selective certificate pinning validation.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: invalidProjectConfig
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: The project configuration is invalid or incomplete.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: errorFetchingPinningInfo
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: Failed to fetch or parse the pinning configuration after exhausting all sources.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: invalidServerCert
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: The server certificate is invalid, corrupted, or could not be parsed.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: pinsMismatch
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: No matching pins were found for the provided certificate.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: allPinsExpired
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: All configured pins for the domain have expired.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: configurationValidationFailed
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: The payload failed validation (e.g., signature mismatch or invalid structure).

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.name: domainNotRegistered
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html#/s:11TrustPinK.abstract: The domain is not registered for pinning and enforcement is enabled.

Enums/TrustPinErrors.html.name: TrustPinErrors
Enums/TrustPinErrors.html.abstract: Represents possible errors thrown by the TrustPin library.

Enums/TrustPinLogLevel.html.name: TrustPinLogLevel
Enums/TrustPinLogLevel.html.abstract: Represents the severity level of a log message.

Enums/TrustPinMode.html.name: TrustPinMode
Enums/TrustPinMode.html.abstract: Defines the behavior for handling unregistered domains in TrustPin certificate pinning.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.name: instance(id:)
Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Returns the TrustPin instance registered under id, creating it if needed.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Configures this TrustPin context with the given credentials and options.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.name: verify(domain:certificate:)
Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Verifies a PEM certificate against the configured pins for domain.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Fetches the TLS leaf certificate from host:port as a PEM string.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Sets the log level for this TrustPin instance.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Returns a URLSessionDelegate bound to this instance that performs certificate pinning.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.name: verify(domain:certificate:)
Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Verifies a certificate using the default TrustPin instance.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Fetches a certificate using the default TrustPin instance.

Classes/TrustPin.html#/s:11TrustPinKit0a.abstract: Registers the TrustPin URLProtocol for system-wide pinning using the default instance.

Classes/TrustPinURLProtocol.html#/s:11Tr.abstract: Registers the TrustPinURLProtocol with the URL loading system.
